author: nishant0
content: I would agree with <@!144468805697929216> here that not verifying withdrawal keys is a blindspot. Is there any reason we cant at least verify possesion of the withdrawal key on the beacon-chain when processing a deposit ? You could have the `AggSig = SigValidator  + SigWithdrawal` and then just verify that. Or is the aim for the withdrawal key to do no signing at all ?
